short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME Please see the attachment for the updated amendment to closing time. All bids must be submitted by February 2, 2024 at 14:00 EST. This requirement is for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work;
description: This is a requirement for Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide  services for the Crown-owned portfolio in accordance with the Contract. The crown-owned portfolio includes: flooring, residential painting, carpentry, roofing, hazardous material decontamination, cleaning and janitorial services, hazardous waste management and facilities management. The services shall be performed in accordance with Annex A Statement of Work. The Crown-owned portfolio includes, but is not limited to, the following: Flooring: hardwood flooring, engineered wood flooring, carpeting, rubber flooring, vinyl composition tile, ceramic tile. Residential painting: interior and exterior painting. Carpentry: general carpentry, door and window installation, roof installation. Roofing: roofing maintenance and repair, roofing installation. Hazardous material decontamination: remediation of hazardous contaminated  material, removal and disposal of hazardous waste. Cleaning and janitorial services: interior cleaning and janitorial services, exterior cleaning  and janitorial services. Hazardous waste disposal: removal and disposal of hazardous waste. Facilities management: space and asset management, energy and facilities management.  Users: Department of National Defence (DND) and Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA);
duration_in_months: Well be able to involve across the rocket teams. 48}
full_summary:
================================

### Title and Description

* **Title (English)**: Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Edmonton
* **Title (French)**: Services d'entretien Correctif - ALFC - Edmonton

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4197864925
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4197864925
* **Publication Date**: December 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024 at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: (TBD)

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to several trade agreements, including the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name (English)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Name (French)**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity Information**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entity Information Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contract Requirements

* This tender is for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio.
* An optional teleconference will be held on December 19, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in English and December 20, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in French.
* Bidders must confirm attendance by December 15, 2023 at 14:00 EST to provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Christine Seguin (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: christine.segu
